title: Spacious 1BR Apartment in Cozy 11 Unit Apartment Building w/amenities
neighborhood: Midway - Near Hamline University, Lightrail, UMN St. Paul
posting_body: ['Description', 'This spacious 1BR apartment is about 600SF.', ' It has an open floor plan to the living and kitchen area, large closets, large bathroom with tub and shower, and an air conditioner in the bedroom.', ' This apartment unit is on the top floor of the building and faces southeast.', 'Resident Pays: Electricity in addition to the $971.25.A required amenities fee is also due monthly.', 'This fee is $70/mo which includes one off-street parking space in the surface lot, a storage locker, access to the building-wide WiFi.', 'This cozy and conveniently located property has eleven spacious one bedroom apartments.', 'All units have large open floor plans and lots of windows offering natural light in all seasons.', "The property is very near to Hamline University, the University of Minnesota's Saint Paul and Minneapolis campus, and St.Thomas University.", 'It is also located within walking distance of University Ave and the Green Line light rail.', 'There is a bus stop right in front of the property, too.', 'Also, within walking distance are plenty of breweries, Newell Park, and some great coffee shops.', 'The property has off-street parking, high speed WiFi internet, laundry facilities, storage lockers, and more!', ' These are great apartments in a great location.', 'Resident Pays: Electricity, Heat, Water/Sewer, Household trash and recycling.', 'A required amenities fee is also due monthly.', 'This fee is $49/mo which includes one off-street parking space in the surface lot, a storage locker, access to the building-wide WiFi.', 'Rental criteria include: Income of 3X rent, two years recent rental history from a non-relative.', 'Exceptions may be made under certain circumstances including students, etc.', 'Features', 'Hardwood floors', 'Air conditioner', 'Refrigerator', 'Walk-in closets', 'Stove and oven', 'Storage space', 'Mirrors', 'Linen closet', 'Tile floors', 'Vinyl floors', 'Window coverings', 'High speed internet', 'Parking', 'Storage space', 'Bilingual', 'Smoke-free', 'Transportation', 'Wireless internet']
